package-manager.name: pkgadd
package-manager.title: Postscript Utilities
package-manager.description: PSUtils is a collection of useful utilities for manipulating PostScript documents. Programs included are psnup (for placing out several logical pages on a single sheet of paper), psselect (for selecting pages from a document), pstops (for general imposition), psbook (for signature generation for booklet printing), and psresize (for adjusting page sizes).
